I wish to beat the BDArmory AI in a dogfight.

Edited June 8, 2023 by TwoCalories
Oh cool, new page 781

Granted. However, it turns out that the BDArmory AI was a secret United States Government test to discover who the best fighter pilot in the world is. They will come to collect you shortly. Hope you can pass the physical!

I wish to get some good news from the people I'm waiting to hear an answer from.

Granted you get bad new

I wish for starship to launch

Granted, it launches and spacex closes down.

i wish honestly space junk and useless space routers were gone

202506082023

Edited June 9, 2023 by AlamoVampire

Granted, they all crash into each other, causing a massive case of Kessler Syndrome.

I wish no more of my KSP files would be corrupted.

Granted.  But now every other file on your hard drive is corrupted.

I wish I spoke binary.

Granted. You are R2D2.

I wish Star Wars weren't that dull.

Granted: All knowledge of it and any other movie are erased from your memory, then you are sent back to 1977 to see it in the cinema for the first time.

It is amazing.

I wish for that too.

Granted. Just like me, you appear in the 1977 USSR, where nobody knows about SW until ~1985, when they say that the SW movie is a sci-fi predecessor of SDI. That's how I knew about the SW.

So, I wish you enjoy the Teens in the Universe + Moscow - Cassiopeia and The Big Space Travel, because Per Aspera Ad Astra, The Mystery of the Third Planet, and The Orion Loop aren't released yet.

Granted: But youtube ruins everything with pop up adds.

I wish that good ideas didn't sell out to greedy companies.

Granted.  Now only bad ideas sell out to greedy companies, and nobody ever has a good idea ever again.

I wish local stores wouldn't eventually become international conglomerates.

Granted. Said stories will be forgotten in roughly a few weeks
I wish that the kraken dosn't exist.

Granted. KSP was just your nightmare dream.

I wish for helium argonide.

granted you kerbals are full of argon 

i wish for SRB's to work

Granted. SRB makes you start working.

I wish for a hidden Antarctic base.

granted you cannot find it 

i wish for sls to fly

Granted.  
sl, sl, sl. Now you have 3 sls to fly.

I wish Starliner was again CST-100.

Granted: you find one leaning on the other in a plane graveyard.

I wish to visit that place.
granted you board a qantas a380 and see

You become his next meal.

i wish to see diamond rain

granted you get hit on the head and die 

i wish for lego mars perseverance

Granted you get a single brick a 2 x 4 with NASA on one side and an 8 bit image of the word Perseverance on the other and it costs you $1,999,999,999.99 USD
